item.title: A Comprehensive Guide to Workflow as a Service System Design
item.description: Alright, let’s design a Workflow as a Service (WaaS) system. Designing a system like this is a broad topic, and a detailed design could span many pages. Here’s a high-level overview to get you started. 1. Overview: Workflow as a Service (WaaS) is a cloud-based solution that allows businesses to create, manage, and optimize workflows without the need for on-premises infrastructure. It provides a way to automate repetitive tasks and processes, ensuring they are executed consistently.
